definition: car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: They opened the door and the four men alighted .
sentences.chinese: 他們打開車門，四個人都走了出來。

sentences.english: Step 6: If you cannot open the doors, look for an emergency exit window.
sentences.chinese: 如果無法打開緊急車門，則尋找太平門窗戶。

sentences.english: His finger was jammed in a train door.
sentences.chinese: 他的手指被火車門軋傷了。

sentences.english: Both doors were open and snow was fast covering the car.
sentences.chinese: 車門都開着，大雪迅速的蓋住了車。

sentences.english: He leans his arms on the door and brings his face to the window.
sentences.chinese: 他把胳膊枕在車門上，把臉湊近窗戶。

sentences.english: A guard opened the door of the train and the Commander got in.
sentences.chinese: 一個衛兵打開火車門，扎達克跨了進去。

sentences.english: She got out of the car and slammed the door.
sentences.chinese: 她下了車，車門“哐當”一聲關了。

sentences.english: He quickly opens the door and fumbles an arm and pulls it hard.
sentences.chinese: 他趕緊打開車門，摸到一隻手臂，使勁拽。

sentences.english: Shoot! My coat is caught in the door.
This front door shell applies to hover , quality and cheap , welcomed to order .
sentences.chinese: 此車門適用於長城哈弗車系，質優價廉，歡迎訂購。

sentences.english: The director opened her door and got out.
sentences.chinese: 理事長打開車門下了車。

sentences.english: Aziraphale blinked, lowered his hands, and gingerly opened the door.
sentences.chinese: 亞茨拉斐爾眨眨眼，放下手，小心翼翼的打開車門。

sentences.english: Do not get on/off the train when the door-bell buzzes.
sentences.chinese: 列車門蜂鳴聲響，請勿上下列車。

sentences.english: A man in a black coat opened the door of the car and got in.
sentences.chinese: 一個穿黑大衣的男人打開車門，鑽了進來。

sentences.english: Hit the road in this sporty green street machine with opening doors.
sentences.chinese: 打開車門，讓此款花俏的綠色道路機器衝向道路中。

sentences.english: Install the screws attaching the mirror to the door.
sentences.chinese: 安裝把視鏡固定在車門上的螺絲。

definition: car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
to close (a door)/to turn off (light, electrical equipment etc)
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to push open (a gate etc)/to push away/to reject/to decline
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
